ResearchProjectDef.label: Cure Pill Production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to produce Cure Pill, an anti-biotic and painkiller drug.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Sunrise Production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to produce Sunrise, a synthetic general-performance-enhancing drug.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Thrumbo Powder Production
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn to produce Thrumbo powder, a rare combat drug made from grounded thrumbo horn and neutroamine.
